summary: Comprehensive unit test module that validates the ACME challenge implementations, including DNS-01, HTTP-01, TLS‑ALPN‑01, unrecognized challenges and related response handling, focusing on JSON (de)serialization, data validation, hashability, verification logic and RFC‑8555 compliance.
business_intent: Guarantee that the ACME client library correctly processes various challenge types and their responses, preventing regressions and ensuring adherence to the ACME protocol specifications.
